name: Zombie School (calistanguyen)
description:
Sam is a student in a small school located in Boulder Colorado. There was an incident, and the school got attacked by Zombies. She wakes up to find herself in the janitor's closet saved by her professor. Can you help Sam find the other students and a way to escape the school? 

Game Play: 

  • Use arrow keys to move
  • Use 'Z' to interact with characters and objects
